scripts.js: rm -f ../backend/static/bundle.js && tsc && webpack --mode production && cp dist/bundle.js ../backend/static/
scripts.css: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.full.css && purgecss -c purgecss.config.js --css dist/style.full.css -o dist/style.purged.css && postcss dist/style.purged.css > dist/style.css && cp dist/style.css ../backend/static/
scripts.watch-js: rm -f ../backend/static/bundle.js && mkdir -p dist && touch dist/bundle.js && ln dist/bundle.js ../backend/static/bundle.js && tsc --watch & webpack --mode development --no-devtool --watch
scripts.build: yarn js && yarn css && yarn fonts
